name: STACKR-X
description:
STACKR-X is a retro Tetris clone inspired by the Gameboy and NES. It features single-player and local multiplayer modes.

The multiplayer mode is a head-to-head game mode where each player has their own board and gets the same tetrominoes in the same order and the player with the highest score wins.

Scoring

The score you get for clearing lines is based on the following formulas:

  • 1 line: 40 * (LEVEL + 1)
  • 2 lines: 100 * (LEVEL + 1)
  • 3 lines: 300 * (LEVEL + 1)
  • 4 lines: 1200 * (LEVEL + 1)

You also are awarded points for soft drops based on how far the tetromino falls.
